titleHead: [CY] MRN dated - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: [CY] When is your Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN) dated?
dateLegend: [CY] Enter the date from the top right of your MRN letter

error.dayRequired: [CY] You have not entered a day. Enter a day
error.monthRequired: [CY] You have not entered a month. Enter a month
error.yearRequired: [CY] You have not entered a year. Enter a year
error.invalid: [CY] You’ve entered an invalid MRN date. Enter the MRN date
error.future: [CY] You’ve entered a date in the future. Enter the MRN date
error.dateSameAsImage: [CY] You have entered the date from the picture. Look at your own MRN and enter the date shown.
